text: Answer: 35.30 Solution: Number of sequence number in TCP = 232 We know that it is byte number. Total number of segments = 124—:20 =2941758.4219178... = 2941759 Now number of bits sent over a link = [232 x 8] +[2941759 x (20 + 20) x 8] = 3.530110125 X 10° Now wrap around time = Wﬂ?funds = 35.30 seconds
